Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AvailableGames
    This class is a frame to show the players the available games with the specified preferences
    Background
    This class creates the background image for the main Brisca frame
    Background2
    This class receives the image for the backgound Handles the animations of the cards
    Background3
    This class creates the background image for the other frames
    BriscaMain
    This is the main class Once a player has registered he can create a game, view available games, view his playing status and get help info from here
    Card
    This class will create the cards to be used in the game Will assign the images accordingly, rank and suit
    CardImage
    This class handles the image of the cards Will set the specific location for each one Specific card image And will be handle the animation of the game (draws, repaints and rotates cards)
    ChatPanel
    This class creates the chat user interface for the user
    ClientEngine
    This class is the Client Engine Connects the user to the server Makes remote playin possible
    CreatedGame
    This class creates the window for the created games
    Deck
    This class create the deck to be used in the game
    Game
    This class receives the four players, the game manager and stores them until it's time to start the game
    GameManager
    This class creates the game logic
    GameRoom
    This class creates the frame containing the game graphics (animations)
    HowTo
    This class creates a window with the instructions of the game
    Player
    This class manages the player and its game status
    Preferences
    This class opens a new window for selecting the type of game the user wants to create
    SocketServer
    This class is the server Makes remote connection possible Runs connection between the client
    Stats
    This class is a frame to show the players their gaming status
